com.quorum.tessera.nacl.jnacl

Class JnaclSecretBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quorum.tessera.nacl.jnacl.JnaclSecretBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecretBox

    public class JnaclSecretBox
extends Object
implements SecretBox
    An implementation of SecretBox that delegates to the JNaCL static methods

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int cryptoBoxAfternm(byte[] output, byte[] message, int messageLength, byte[] nonce, byte[] sharedKey)
      Seal a message into ciphertext using a shared key
      int cryptoBoxBeforenm(byte[] output, byte[] publicKey, byte[] privateKey)
      Computes a shared key between the given public and private key
      int cryptoBoxKeypair(byte[] publicKey, byte[] privateKey)
      Generates a new keypair The input arrays must be at least 32 bytes long (and only the first 32 bytes are populated if the array is longer)
      int cryptoBoxOpenAfternm(byte[] output, byte[] message, int messageLength, byte[] nonce, byte[] sharedKey)
      Opens a sealed box using the provided shared key

                             byte[] publicKey,
                             byte[] privateKey)
        Description copied from interface: SecretBox
        Computes a shared key between the given public and private key
        Specified by:
        cryptoBoxBeforenm in interface SecretBox
        Parameters:
        output - The output array that contains the shared key
        publicKey - The bytes of the public key
        privateKey - The bytes of the private key

      • cryptoBoxAfternm

        public int cryptoBoxAfternm(byte[] output,
                            byte[] message,
                            int messageLength,
                            byte[] nonce,
                            byte[] sharedKey)
        Description copied from interface: SecretBox
        Seal a message into ciphertext using a shared key
        Specified by:
        cryptoBoxAfternm in interface SecretBox
        Parameters:
        output - the output ciphertext that contains the required 0 padding from NaCL
        message - the input message with the require 0 padding from NaCL
        messageLength - the length of the padding input message
        nonce - a unique nonce to encrypt the message with
        sharedKey - the shared key to encrypt the message with
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful (0 for success, -1 for failure)

      • cryptoBoxOpenAfternm

        public int cryptoBoxOpenAfternm(byte[] output,
                                byte[] message,
                                int messageLength,
                                byte[] nonce,
                                byte[] sharedKey)
        Description copied from interface: SecretBox
        Opens a sealed box using the provided shared key
        Specified by:
        cryptoBoxOpenAfternm in interface SecretBox
        Parameters:
        output - the output array for the unencrpyted message
        message - the cipher text with the require 0 padding from NaCL
        messageLength - the length of the message + the required 0 padding from NaCL
        nonce - the nonce that was used to seal the box
        sharedKey - the shared key
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful (0 for success, -1 for failure)

      • cryptoBoxKeypair

        public int cryptoBoxKeypair(byte[] publicKey,
                            byte[] privateKey)
        Description copied from interface: SecretBox
        Generates a new keypair The input arrays must be at least 32 bytes long (and only the first 32 bytes are populated if the array is longer)
        Specified by:
        cryptoBoxKeypair in interface SecretBox
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The output array for the public key
        privateKey - The output array for the private key
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful (0 for success, -1 for failure)
